data.name: ðŸ“ˆ The Insider's Playbook: Getting Hired at Schwarz Group & Other World-Class Companies
data.description:
Workshop done by Dennis Kline. An HR Operation Senior Professional at Schwarz Group. 
You will learn what world-class companies really look for and how to stand out in competitive hiring processes. Based on 15 years of experience in executive search and talent acquisition at the Schwarz Group, this workshop reveals insider strategies to:

- Decode what top recruiters actually value
- Turn your experience into achievements that impress
- Build a network that opens real doors

Exclusive to 42 Heilbronn students and recent graduates, this session gives you the tools to bypass the application black hole and position yourself as a candidate companies actively pursue.
data.location: Open Space - 42 Heilbronn (in front of ping pong table)
